paragraphs: I like exploring product design and UX while building web and mobile apps that matter.
This portfolio showcases my journey, projects, and skills. Feel free to explore and get in touch if you'd like to collaborate!

items.name: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with vanilla JavaScript
Features dark/light mode, dynamic content loading, and GitHub integration
Fully configurable through JSON with automated README generation

items.name: Bueno Loans (Android Application)
description: App to facilitate micro loans to blue collar workers through B2B partnerships.
Executed end-to-end localization, push notifications, form handling with validations, and state management for loan processing and views.
Implemented web view support, automated build distribution using Bitbucket CI/CD pipelines, and developed an SMS reading and synchronization SDK with Java and Native Modules.
Created a Kotlin wrapper for third-party libraries to support React Native methods, integrating multiple third-party SDKs to enhance functionality.

items.name: KreditPe - Credit Line (Android Application)
description: Developed complex UIs utilizing react-native-animated and React Native Animated APIs for seamless, interactive experiences.
Integrated Camera API for QR code scanning to facilitate secure payments.
Built efficient transaction and loan listing views using Virtualized List and Flat List components, optimizing performance for large data sets.

items.name: Customer Relationship Management (Web Application)
description: Developed a modular web application for customer support teams to efficiently view and manage customer-related queries.

Implemented features including user and loan management, promise-to-pay tracking, manual document verification, dashboards, waivers, settlements, campaigns, and role- and permission-based UI with action support.
Ensured adherence to web security best practices, cross-browser compatibility, and optimized performance.

items.name: Attendance Management System (Web Application)
description: Developed Create, Add, Update, and Delete functionalities for managing Teams, Job Sites, Users, Brands, Accounts, Roles, and Service Areas, incorporating filters, search, sorting, form validations, and REST API integrations.
Built a custom calendar 'Time Sheet' for managing driver's working hours, allowing for add, edit, and delete actions with support for various trip states within a day.

Designed and implemented a serviceable area view using Google Maps API to define areas by latitude and longitude arrays or KML files, with functionality to draw and manage polygons for service area boundaries.

Implemented a real-time Chat application with WebSocket integration, featuring unread message notifications, date and time stamps, chat history, user/team selection, and emoji support for enriched communication.
Created a Time Tracker with Virtualized List for real-time driver activity monitoring across teams, displaying driver statuses such as absent, on break, busy, or out of service.

items.name: Eco Service - Fleet Management (Web Application)
description: Developed Create, Add, Update, and Delete functionalities for managing Teams, Users, Drivers, Cars, Accounts, Roles, Permissions, and Payments, incorporating filters, search, sorting, form validations, and REST API integrations for seamless data management.

Implemented a feature to assign support team members to Cars using a customized Mapbox integration, leveraging various map views (terrain, buildings, icons, labels) with search and geolocation capabilities for efficient resource allocation.

responsibilities: Developed Bueno Loans (Android Application) to facilitate micro loans to blue collar workers through B2B partnerships.
Executed end-to-end localization, push notifications, form handling with validations, and state management for loan processing and views.
Implemented web view support, automated build distribution using Bitbucket CI/CD pipelines, and developed an SMS reading and synchronization SDK with Java and Native Modules.

Implemented features including user and loan management, promise-to-pay tracking, manual document verification, dashboards, waivers, settlements, campaigns, and role- and permission-based UI.

items.name: Bachelor of Engineering - BE, Computer Science (Chitkara University)

footer.tagline: Let's connect and build something amazing together!
